message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I think we can both do better than a 50/50 split. I'm willing to take a little less now so we can both get more in the end. Let's see if this works for you.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's try a 55/45 split.  This will still give you a good amount, and it will help us both get more than we would with your previous offer.
